description: Cross-platform socket API for Xamarin iOS/Android/Forms, Windows Phone 8/8.1, Windows Store and Windows Desktop. Includes support for TCP and UDP listeners and clients, as well as UDP multicast.
releaseNotes:
1.1.5 (2015-03-11)

Bugfixes:

- Fixed a `NullReferenceException` that could occur in `CommsInterface.GetAllInterfacesAsync` if an interface had no IPv4 unicast address. 

1.1.4 (2015-02-09)

Features:

- `TcpSocketClient` supports TLS connections on `TcpSocketClient` via optional parameter on `ConnectAsync`. Thanks @galvesribeiro.

1.1.2 / 1.1.3 (2015-02-06)

Bugfixes:

- The backing `UdpClient` instances for the .NET UdpSocket* classes now have the `EnableBroadcast` property set to true. This should prevent `Access Denied` exceptions from occuring when attempting to send data to a broadcast address.  
- Fixed an `ObjectDisposedException` that would occur when `SendToAsync` was called a second time on a `UdpSocketReceiver` if it had not yet been bound using 'StartListeningAsync`.
summary: Cross-platform TCP and UDP socket API for Xamarin iOS/Android/Forms, Windows Phone 8/8.1, Windows Store and Windows Desktop.
title: Sockets Plugin for Xamarin and Windows (PCL)
